sent.orig: I used to work long hours and every lunchtime I faced the same indecisions.
sent.trans: 我过去经常长时间工作，每到午餐时间，我同样会拿不定主意。

sent.orig: Well, during lunchtime, I was making fun of Dave.
sent.trans: 嗯，午饭时，我正在捉弄戴夫。

sent.orig: Shaun Wright-Phillips became a Chelsea player this lunchtime after signing a five year contract.
sent.trans: 今天中午签订五年合约后，肖恩-赖特菲利浦斯成为一员。

sent.orig: Many restaurants do a very reasonable set menu at lunchtime.
sent.trans: 许多餐馆中午都提供价钱合理的客饭。

sent.orig: When do you learn best – morning, lunchtime or evening?
sent.trans: 你工作学习的最佳时间-早晨，中午，还是晚上？
